full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,DPAL RDO RJE'I 'JIGS BYED CHEN PO'I BSKYED RIM GYI RNAM BZHAG SKU GSUM NOR BU'I BANG MDZOD CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @183B (ZHES DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED CHEN PO'I BSKYED RIM GYI RNAM BZHAG SKU GSUM NOR BU'I DBANG MDZOD CES BYA BA 'DI NI, DPYOD LDAN DAR HAN DGE SLONG BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS DANG, DAD LDAN NANG SO DGE SLONG CHOS 'PHEL GNYIS KYIS BSKUL ZHING, RANG GI DAD PAS KYANG KUN NAS BSLANGS TE, RJE DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA'I BSKYED RIM GSAL BA'I SGRON ME DANG, PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I BSKYED RIM DNGOS GRUB SNYE MA DANG, YANG DES MDZAD PA'I 'DUS PA'I BSKYED RIM DNGOS GRUB RGYA MTSO'I SNYING PO DANG, L'U AI PA'I LUGS KYI BDE MCHOG GI BSKYED RIM DANG, LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHE NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I @184A *, ,'JIGS BYED DPA' BO GCIG PA'I BSKYED RIM DANG, YANG DES MDZAD PA'I ZIN THO RGYAS PA DANG, BSDUS PA 'JAM DPAL MNYES BYED DANG, MKHAS GRUB CHEN PO 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJES MDZAD PA'I BSKYED RIM SKAL BZANG 'JUG NGOGS DANG, THANG SAG PA RIN PO CHE DNGOS GRUB RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA'I BSKYED RIM DANG, PAD DKAR 'DZIN PA SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA'I BSKYED RIM DNGOS GRUB GTER MDZOD DANG, MKHAS MCHOG NGAG DBANG BYAMS PA RIN PO CHE MDZAD PA'I BSKYED RIM ZA MA TOG GI SNYING PO DANG, RDO RJE 'CHANG MKHAN CHEN RIN PO CHE YE SHES DPAL 'BYOR DPAL BZANG POS MDZAD PA'I RGYUD SDE'I RGYA MTSO'I GRU GZINGS DANG; MKHAS DBANG YE SHES SKAL BZANG GIS MDZAD PA'I BSKYED RIM KUNTA'I DGA' STON SOGS LA ZHIB TU LTA RTOGS BYAS SHING, GCIG LA GSAL KHA MA BYUNG BA GCIG SHOS LAS KHA BSKANG STE, BLA MA DAM PA DU MA'I ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOR BSTEN PA'I MTHUS, LAM 'DI'I NYAMS LEN LA MOS PA MI DMAN PA'I SH'AKYA BTZUN PA BLO BZANG LHUN 'GRUB MING GZHAN SGEG PA'I RDO RJE ZHES BYA BAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI, DAD BRTZON PHUN SUM TSOGS PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG SHES RAB GU SHRI'O, , 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BSTAN SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR DU KUN MKHYEN BTZONG KHA PA'I MDO SNGAGS KYI BSTAN PA PHYOGS DUS GNAS SKABS THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PA DANG, YANG SGOS SU SKAL LDAN GYI GDUL BYA RNAMS NYE LAM 'DI LA BRTEN NAS BLA MA 'JIGS MDZAD RDO RJE'I GO 'PHANG MYUR DU THOB PAR GYUR CIG , ,,
